title: CYBER_COWBOY
author: CYBER_COWBOY
created_time: July 21, 2023, 11:37:01 AMLast edit: July 28, 2023, 08:00:53 PM by CYBER_COWBOY
content: " Unfortunately I do not have any concrete evidence but I have a strong suspicion that this user is an alt of elmanchez (u=2553198) and ps34 (u=2751022). If dealing with this user, I suggest you trust him no more than you would the other two. If in doubt, use escrow. DireWolfM14 " - I don't care if you feel that you need to paint on my wall, go ahead and let your emotions run a riot, this "neutral-feedback drama" is so nerdy so I can only laugh.But I can do you a favor, if you dislike me so much, let's meet and speak face to face, I show who I am and you can show the forum that you actually can back up your worlds.Yes this is how I talk to myself

comments.author: yahoo62278
comments.body: I really don't like users using the trust system for this type of stuff. Speculation tags are just not cool IMO. I def don't think ps34 could write a topic like this 1 is written. Hopefully you guys can work out your differences and get the tag removed, but if not there is that ignore button.

comments.author: CYBER_COWBOY
comments.created_time: July 21, 2023, 12:00:19 PMLast edit: July 21, 2023, 02:38:50 PM by CYBER_COWBOY
comments.body: Quote from: yahoo62278 on July 21, 2023, 11:56:20 AMI really don't like users using the trust system for this type of stuff. Speculation tags are just not cool IMO. I def don't think ps34 could write a topic like this 1 is written. Hopefully you guys can work out your differences and get the tag removed, but if not there is that ignore button.Yes I had him on ignore since the day he came in to my loan thread and was rude, but he obvious could not take that. Dunno why... I guess he is used to walk over people here and can't accept when people stands up for themself and speaks back. That I should be Ps34 and the other user (i forgot his name) is ridiculous and I don't think he actually believe that, he just want to paint on my wall, and he is very welcome to do so if it makes him happy and makes him feel stronger.Maybe he is angry because I called him and Timelord same shit. but he just proofed us all that they are.But in the end it's just sad and so unnecessary.

comments.author: DireWolfM14

Speculation tags are just not cool IMO.I'm 100% in agreement with this comment, but when in Rome...The trust system seems to have become the new post-it-note for the forum, even Switzerland suggested I leave that tag.

comments.author: Aanuoluwatofunmi
comments.body: Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on July 21, 2023, 11:37:01 AM- You accused me for take people's KYC when they asked for a loan (AGAIN - please ask the people that borrowed money if they send ANYTHING ever)- Then you raged out because I asked LoyceV to give me feedback that i never want to take a loan. (I still said then that please leave me alone)- You also replied that I was mentally illl. (You was again ignored.)Again for the fourth time i kindly ask you, please LEAVE me alone! If you really want to argue with me, let's do it like adults and not kids. I have no problem with that.You see one thing about this forum is that you need to learn how to keep your head straight, this is bitcointalk community and you should expect many talks about you and your reputation, but the good luck you've got is when none of this talks concerns you or finds you guilty of them, any accusation without concrete evidence to it will always be discarded by the community, this is ot the first time people were wrongly accused or something, yours is to remain upright.

comments.author: lovesmayfamilis
comments.body: Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on July 21, 2023, 03:34:16 PMI understand what you saying, but that I should be an alt of Ps34 and the other guy is ridiculous. Everyone with at least 1% of brain now this is not the case. Â I would like to correct a little about the fact that you and other accounts may have different IPs. This does not mean anything; always remember TOR and the easy change of IP addresses.But this remark does not mean that I am on someone's side. Usually, whoever leaves neutral tags with some kind of accusation should provide a reference link. In addition to everything, time will put everything in its place. Simple guesses don't say anything, why would you care about people with less than 1 percent brains? The rest must draw their own conclusions.

I should just ignore it, but it irritates me that I get accused for being a guy that have speaking very bad to me, both in posting, pm & in telegram. But I should not let it affect me like that, you have right. But I am sure Wolf don't think we are the same person, he just want a reason to try to start an argue with me. (He tried many times before but just got ignored, he prob hurt) but I don't argue on the internet, if I argue it will happen face2face.

comments.author: PytagoraZ
comments.body: Hi, buddyI feel the same way about you. I get neutral tags referring to the posts themselves, not evidence. but on DT recommended me to forget about it, so I did. Maybe it's better to forget about it before DT gets angry and makes his tag turn red. DT can do it, with or without proof.Honestly I'm Sympathetic because you get a tag without any proof of reference. But that is our fate as members of the lower classCongratulations, looks like you succeeded. because I don't see that neutral tag anymoreQuote from: lovesmayfamilis on July 21, 2023, 04:09:27 PM~cut~Hi, buddyLooks like we have an unfinished discussion. Maybe I could complain, because you also complain when you think I'm not responding to someone

comments.author: Timelord2067
comments.body: Congratulations @dire your first thread full of angst and navel gazing.If I could find the quote, I'd post that image "to not feed the Trolls"In any event, speaking of using the Trust feedback wall as a post it note wall:Here is a retaliatory comment made by the OP:Quote from: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=3533170;dt DireWolfM14Â  Â  2023-07-21Â  Â  ReferenceÂ  Â  Trust abuser, fake accusing people with zero proof. His feeling tell him what to do. This guy's judgment can not be trusted, and if you want peace, stay far away from this user. First hi accusing me for being an ALT of Ps34 and now this. I don't even offer secured loans.Speaking of ps34 ... has anyone else noticed ps34 has stopped posting while ps1234 has "just woken up"?

comments.author: Stalker22
comments.body: Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on July 21, 2023, 05:14:28 PMIt's sad that people handle out feedback like that ~What is truly sad is that both of you little bitches are complaining about the neutral feedback on your profiles, while at the same time, you are leaving retaliatory feedback and thus abusing the trust system yourselves.

comments.author: The Sceptical Chymist
comments.body: Quote from: DireWolfM14 on July 21, 2023, 02:09:16 PMeven Switzerland suggested I leave that tag. Â LOL.Quote from: CYBER_COWBOY on July 21, 2023, 05:14:28 PMIt's sad that people handle out feedback like that, I think it's only hurting the forums reputation and make it harder for it to grow in general. It's been that way for years in case you haven't noticed.Â  It's just that you're now on the receiving end of some feedback you don't agree with.Â  And I'm not clear on this: were you asking for all of those documents in your lending thread (the income statement, etc.)?Â  I looked at your terms and didn't see anything like that and don't know if you'd made changes or not.Â  Hopefully you weren't, because despite you stating adamantly that your intention wouldn't be to use that information to scam anyone, no one can read your mind.Â  A scammer and an honest lender would both say the same thing, so who's to say?Quote from: Stalker22 on July 21, 2023, 10:19:40 PMWhat is truly sad is that both of you little bitches are complaining about the neutral feedback on your profiles, while at the same time, you are leaving retaliatory feedback and thus abusing the trust system yourselves. Now, now.Â  I'm not familiar with CYBER_COWBOY, but DireWolfM14 is certainly not a bitch of any size.

If any problems occur will adjust my ratingYou have more than double the number of negative trust feedbacks placed against other users compared to the number I have (and a similar proportion of positives) - Perhaps instead of giving armchair opinions you go back and review your own trust feedbacks left for others?Â  (Including your negatives)(Feel free to review mine to compare to your own)I haven't seen your health issue thread for a while.Â  I hope you are still on the mend.I may need to revise a tag or 2 but mostly factual information. comments.author: Timelord2067

Have a good day buddy.I may have been accused of not having all the information, but not one person has said I have acted with malice.PM me when you are ready to talk.

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: Really? This for a neutral tag? You can get mad all you want, OP, but a neutral tag like that is not abusing the trust system. In general a neutral tag is not, unless it is clearly negative in spirit but neutral in color, something like "CYBER_COWBOY is a fucking scammer, don't deal with him." That could be a case of trust abuse if it is not supported by anything other than opinion.
